1600056000.title: BBC World News
1600056000.descr: The latest news, bought to you by the BBC, 24-hours a day. All the latest updates from the world of politics, business, education, health, sports and the arts, both nationally and internationally.

1600072200.title: HARDtalk
1600072200.descr: HARDtalk is an interview programme on a one-on-one basis where prominent international personalities including presidents and prime ministers of several countries, leading cultural figures, scientists, actors, influencers are being interviewed. The hosts are genuine experts who always get to the core of every topic, get all the answers from the guests so that the viewers see the whole picture.

1600074000.title: BBC News
1600074000.descr: All the latest news from the BBC, which is a service provider funded by a licencing fee paid by British households. It is regulated by Ofcom, and aims to educate and inform, but also entertain, it's audience. The content produced by the BBC is intended to be impartial, and it was established in 1922, with headquarters in Westminster, London.

1600104600.title: BBC Focus on Africa
1600104600.descr: Focus on Africa is a BBC news program broadcast globally and on local partner channels of the BBC in African countries. The program is hosted by Sophie Ikenye, a news presenter from Kenya. It includes news, sport and business from across Africa and the rest of the globe. Get the top African stories and keep up with the latest international events.

1600110000.title: Outside Source
1600110000.descr: Outside Source is a news programme produced by the BBC and broadcasted from Monday to Thursday. It uses social media and touch-screen technology in the presentation of its stories, which gives a new, digital style to live video news.

1600122600.title: Asia Business Report
1600122600.descr: Asia Business Report is a BBC-produced informational television program covering the latest news and issues in the world of business on the Asian continent. Join to find out all the biggest stories from Asia's business market, through live broadcast from the BBC studio in Singapore.

1600123500.title: Sport Today
1600123500.descr: Sport Today is a television program in which BBC covers the biggest sport stories of the day from all around the world.
